key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks, particularly anti-money laundering (AML) and consumer protection regulations
Interest rate sensitivity impacting net interest margins (NIM)
Integration risks from recent acquisitions, including Bank Leumi USA and Westchester Bank Holding Corp
Competitive pressures from traditional banks and fintech companies
Slower loan growth and adjustments in net interest income (NII)
controversies: Criticism from the National Community Reinvestment Coalition (NCRC) over the proposed merger with 1st United Bank
social_issues: Community opposition to mergers, potentially impacting underserved communities
governance_issues: Ongoing regulatory scrutiny and compliance challenges
